mapper.insert: insert into manager (mgl_id, role_id, manager_name, manager_psd, manager_sex, tel, address, Comment) values (#{mglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update manager set role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_name = #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_psd = #{managerPsd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_sex = #{managerSex,jdbcType=CHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where mgl_id = #{mglId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select mgl_id, role_id, manager_name, manager_psd, manager_sex, tel, address, Comment from manager
